trans-unit.source: Implements one row in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
Grid items represent the hierarchy of the view into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
You can use a GridItem to obtain information about the grid's state and contents.

GridItem objects should not be cached because they represent a snapshot of the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> at the time they are accessed, and grid activity might dispose them.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> often recreates GridItem objects internally without changing the view to the user.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the specified property is expandable to show nested properties.
If a property is expandable, a plus (+) sign is displayed by the property name in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
If the plus sign is clicked and no nested properties are available, the plus sign is then removed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property can be expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is false.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> is in an expanded state.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
The Expanded property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, but a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> is not expandable.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> objects, if any, associated as a child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> objects.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.

For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, you must also ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> has a valid value.
For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Parent%2A> property must be `null`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType"></xref> values.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the text of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
This class gets the text that displays in the left column of the grid.
The text retrieved can be different from the actual property name of the property represented by this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>.

You can get the name for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> by retrieving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> and checking its <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name%2A> property.
A <xref:System.String> representing the text associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>, if any.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.GridItemType%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, this value will be `null`.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> representing the parent of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
This property is only valid for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>.
You can use this property to retrieve information such as the property type of the grid item, the name of the grid item, or the type converter for the grid item.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, selects this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selection is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets user-defined data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the current value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
The current value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
